original_text: And when she looked, there was the king standing by his pillar at the entrance, and the captains and the trumpeters beside the king, and all the people of the land rejoicing and blowing trumpets, and the singers with their musical instruments leading in the celebration. And Athaliah tore her clothes and cried, “Treason! Treason!”
korean_text: 보매 왕이 성전 문 기둥 곁에 섰고 지휘관들과 나팔수들이 왕의 곁에 모셔 서 있으며 그 땅의 모든 백성들이 즐거워하여 나팔을 불며 노래하는 자들은 주악하며 찬송을 인도하는지라 이에 아달랴가 그의 옷을 찢으며 외치되 반역이로다 반역이로다 하매

sentences.original_text: there was the king standing by his pillar at the entrance,
sentences.korean_translation: 입구 곁 그의 기둥에 서 있는 왕이 있었고,

sentences.original_text: and the captains and the trumpeters beside the king,
and all the people of the land rejoicing and blowing trumpets,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 땅의 모든 백성은 기뻐하며 나팔을 불고 있었고,

sentences.original_text: and the singers with their musical instruments leading in the celebration.
sentences.korean_translation: 악기를 가진 노래하는 자들은 축하 행사를 이끌고 있었다.
